00011 void Parser::init() {
00012     //define default values
00013     variables_with_default_values.push_back("COMPASS_MODEL");
00014     default_values_of_varialbes.push_back("FULL_COMPASS");
00015 
00016     variables_with_default_values.push_back("ASG");
00017     default_values_of_varialbes.push_back("ASG_SYNCHRON");
00018 
00019     variables_with_default_values.push_back("STATISTICS_MODULE");
00020     default_values_of_varialbes.push_back("NONE");
00021 
00022     variables_with_default_values.push_back("EVENT_HANDLER");
00023     default_values_of_varialbes.push_back("EH_DO_ALL");
00024 }
00025 
00026 bool Parser::is_comment(const string& line) {
00027     return (line.at(0)=='#');
00028 }
00029 
00030 bool Parser::contains_assignment(const string& line) {
00031     unsigned int pos_of_equal_sign = line.find_first_of("=");
00032     return pos_of_equal_sign != string::npos;
00033 }
00034 
00035 string Parser::get_var_name(const string& line) {
00036     unsigned int pos_of_equal_sign = line.find_first_of("=");
00037 
00038     //check if equal sign exists in line
00039     if(pos_of_equal_sign == string::npos) {
00040         throw UnsupportedOperationException("Syntax error in main project file. Line \""+line+"\" doesn't contain a "
00041                 "valid assignment.");
00042     }
00043 
00044     //extract variable name from line
00045     string var_name = line.substr(0,pos_of_equal_sign);
00046 
00047     //get rid of unwanted leading and trailing spaces
00048     boost::trim(var_name);
00049     return var_name;
00050 }
00051 
00052 string Parser::get_default_value(const string& var) {
00053     for(int i=0; i<variables_with_default_values.size(); i++) {
00054         if(!var.compare(variables_with_default_values[i]) ||
00055            !var.compare("ROBOT_FILENAME") ||
00056            !var.compare("OBSTACLE_FILENAME") ) {
00057 
00058             //variable has a default value
00059             if(!var.compare("ROBOT_FILENAME")) {
00060                 return project_filename_;
00061             }
00062             else if (!var.compare("OBSTACLE_FILENAME")) {
00063                 return project_filename_;
00064             }
00065             else {
00066                 return default_values_of_varialbes[i];
00067             }
00068         }
00069     }
00070     return "";
00071 }
00072 
00073 string Parser::get_var_value(const string& line, const string& name) {
00074     size_t pos_of_first_quote_sign = line.find_first_of("\"");
00075     size_t pos_of_last_quote_sign = line.find_last_of("\"");
00076 
00077     //check if value is correctly quoted and value exists
00078     if(pos_of_first_quote_sign == string::npos || pos_of_last_quote_sign == string::npos) {
00079         //get default value, if one exists
00080         string default_value = get_default_value(name);
00081         if(!default_value.empty()) {
00082             return default_value;
00083         }
00084         else {
00085             throw UnsupportedOperationException("Syntax error in main project file. Either variable value in line "
00086                 "\""+line+"\" is not quote correctly or value is not defined.");
00087         }
00088     }
00089 
00090     return line.substr(pos_of_first_quote_sign+1,
00091                        pos_of_last_quote_sign-pos_of_first_quote_sign-1);
00092 
00093 }
00094 
00095 string Parser::get_string_value_from_map(map<string,string> variables_and_values,
00096                                                     const string& var_name) {
00097     //get iterator to value to be searched for
00098     map<string,string>::const_iterator map_iterator = variables_and_values.find(var_name);
00099 
00100     //check if var_name exists in given map
00101     if(map_iterator == variables_and_values.end()) {
00102         //check if var_name has a default value
00103         string default_value = get_default_value(var_name);
00104         if(!default_value.empty()) {
00105             //variable has a default value
00106             return default_value;
00107         }
00108         else {
00109             //variable hasn't a default value and hasn't been initialized
00110             throw UnsupportedOperationException("Variable according to "+var_name+" has not been initialized and"
00111                     "no default value for this variable exists.");
00112         }
00113     } else {
00114         //return value of var_name
00115         return variables_and_values.find(var_name)->second;
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 int Parser::get_int_value_from_map(map<string,string> variables_and_values,
00120                                                     const string& var_name) {
00121     //get string value from map
00122     string string_value = get_string_value_from_map(variables_and_values, var_name);
00123 
00124     //convert string value to int
00125     try {
00126         return boost::lexical_cast<int>(string_value);
00127 
00128     } catch(const boost::bad_lexical_cast& ) {
00129         throw UnsupportedOperationException("Failed casting string to integer.");
00130     }
00131 }
00132 
00133 void Parser::init_variables(map<string,string> variables_and_values) {
00134 
00135     //Variable names saved in the map are specified in the "Projectfiles Specification"-document
00136     asg_= get_int_value_from_map(variables_and_values, "ASG");
00137     compass_model_ = get_string_value_from_map(variables_and_values, "COMPASS_MODEL");
00138     event_handler_ = get_int_value_from_map(variables_and_values, "EVENT_HANDLER");
00139     obstacle_filename_ = get_string_value_from_map(variables_and_values, "OBSTACLE_FILENAME");
00140     project_name_ = get_string_value_from_map(variables_and_values, "PROJECT_NAME");
00141     robot_filename_ = get_string_value_from_map(variables_and_values, "ROBOT_FILENAME");
00142     statistics_module_ = get_string_value_from_map(variables_and_values, "STATISTICS_MODULE");
00143 }
00144 
00145 void Parser::load_main_project_file(const string& project_filename) {
00146     string line;
00147     ifstream project_file;
00148     project_filename_ = project_filename;
00149     string main_project_filename = project_filename_ + ".swarm";
00150     map<string, string> variables_and_values;
00151 
00152     project_file.open(main_project_filename.c_str());
00153     if(project_file.is_open()) {
00154         string var_name;
00155         string var_value;
00156         while(!project_file.eof()) {
00157             //read file line by line
00158             getline(project_file, line);
00159 
00160             //check whether current line isn't a comment and contains an assignment
00161             if(!is_comment(line) && contains_assignment(line)) {
00162                 //get variable name
00163                 var_name = get_var_name(line);
00164 
00165                 //get variable value
00166                 var_value = get_var_value(line, var_name);
00167 
00168                 //insert variable and value into map
00169                 variables_and_values.insert(pair<string,string>(var_name,var_value));
00170             }
00171         }
00172         project_file.close();
00173 
00174         //up to now: read all variables and its values from project file and
00175         //inserted them into a map
00176 
00177         //initialize variables
00178         init_variables(variables_and_values);
00179 
00180     } else {
00181         throw UnsupportedOperationException("Unable to open given project file.");
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 string Parser::get_next_value_in_line(const string& line, int line_number, bool last_value) {
00186     //character that seperates values in line
00187     char seperator = ',';
00188     string value;
00189 
00190     size_t pos_of_next_seperator = line.find_first_of(seperator, position_in_line_);
00191 
00192     //check if there exists a next seperator
00193     if(pos_of_next_seperator == string::npos) {
00194 
00195         if(last_value) {
00196             //value to read is last value => return end of line beginning at given position
00197             value = line.substr(position_in_line_,line.size()-position_in_line_);
00198             position_in_line_ += value.size()+1;
00199             return value;
00200         } else {
00201             //if value to read is not supposed to be the last value, an error occured
00202             string line_num;
00203             std::stringstream out;
00204             out << line_number;
00205             line_num = out.str();
00206             throw UnsupportedOperationException("Syntax error in line "+line_num+" of robot file.");
00207         }
00208     }
00209 
00210     value = line.substr(position_in_line_,pos_of_next_seperator-position_in_line_);
00211     position_in_line_ += value.size()+1;
00212 
00213     //Just to be sure: get rid of leading and trailing spaces
00214     //(if the input file is correct, then value doesn't contain any leading or trailing spaces)
00215     boost::trim(value);
00216 
00217     //remove leading and trailing quotes, if value is quoted
00218     value = remove_quotes(value);
00219 
00220     return value;
00221 }
00222 
00223 string Parser::remove_quotes(const string& value) {
00224 
00225     string return_value = value;
00226 
00227     //get first and last character of given string
00228     char first_char = value.at(0);
00229     char last_char = value.at(value.length()-1);
00230 
00231     if(first_char == '\"' && last_char == '\"') {
00232         //first and last characters are quotes => remove quotes
00233         return_value = value.substr(1,value.length()-2);
00234     }
00235 
00236     return return_value;
00237 }
00238 
00239 double Parser::get_next_double_value_in_line(const string& line, int line_number, bool last_value) {
00240     //get next value (as string) from given line
00241     string next_value = get_next_value_in_line(line, line_number, last_value);
00242 
00243     //cast value to double value
00244     double next_double_value = string_to_double(next_value);
00245 
00246     return next_double_value;
00247 }
00248 
00249 Vector3d Parser::get_next_vector3d_in_line(const string& line, int line_number, bool last_value) {
00250 
00251     //TODO(martinah) maybe use arrays here
00252 
00253     //get next three values (as string) from given line
00254     string value_1 = get_next_value_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00255     string value_2 = get_next_value_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00256     string value_3 = get_next_value_in_line(line, line_number, last_value);
00257 
00258     //cast values to double values
00259     double double_value_1 = string_to_double(value_1);
00260     double double_value_2 = string_to_double(value_2);
00261     double double_value_3 = string_to_double(value_3);
00262 
00263     //create Vector3d with from these three values
00264     Vector3d my_vector;
00265     my_vector.insert_element(kXCoord, double_value_1);
00266     my_vector.insert_element(kYCoord, double_value_2);
00267     my_vector.insert_element(kZCoord, double_value_3);
00268 
00269     return my_vector;
00270 }
00271 
00272 double Parser::string_to_double(const string& my_string) {
00273     //cast given string value to double
00274     try {
00275         return boost::lexical_cast<double>(my_string);
00276     } catch(const boost::bad_lexical_cast& ) {
00277         throw UnsupportedOperationException("Failed casting string "+my_string+" to double.");
00278     }
00279 }
00280 
00281 void Parser::init_robot_values_for_line(const string& line, int line_number) {
00282 
00283     //begin at beginning of line
00284     position_in_line_ = 0;
00285 
00286     //The order of these initializations is important!
00287     double id = get_next_double_value_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00288     Vector3d position = get_next_vector3d_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00289     string type = get_next_value_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00290     Vector3d velocity = get_next_vector3d_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00291     Vector3d acceleration = get_next_vector3d_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00292     string status = get_next_value_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00293     string marker_info = get_next_value_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00294     string algorithm = get_next_value_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00295     string color = get_next_value_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00296     Vector3d x_axis = get_next_vector3d_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00297     Vector3d y_axis = get_next_vector3d_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00298     Vector3d z_axis = get_next_vector3d_in_line(line, line_number, true);
00299 
00300     //if no exception is thrown up to this point, values read correctly
00301     //=> add values to global variables
00302     initiale_robot_positions_.push_back(position);
00303     initiale_robot_velocities_.push_back(velocity);
00304     initiale_robot_accelerations_.push_back(acceleration);
00305     initiale_robot_types_.push_back(type);
00306     initiale_robot_stati_.push_back(status);
00307     initiale_robot_marker_information_.push_back(marker_info);
00308     initiale_robot_algorithms_.push_back(algorithm);
00309     initiale_robot_colors_.push_back(color);
00310 
00311     boost::tuple<Vector3d, Vector3d, Vector3d> tmp(x_axis, y_axis, z_axis);
00312     initiale_robot_coordinate_sytems_.push_back(tmp);
00313 }
00314 
00315 void Parser::init_obstacle_values_for_line(const string& line, int line_number) {
00316 
00317     //begin at beginning of line
00318     position_in_line_ = 0;
00319 
00320     //The order of these initializations is important!
00321     string type = get_next_value_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00322     Vector3d position = get_next_vector3d_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00323     string marker_info = get_next_value_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00324 
00325     //if object is a sphere or a marker, size will equal to the zero-vector,
00326     //otherwise the values of this vector will be set later.
00327     Vector3d size;
00328     size.insert_element(kXCoord, 0);
00329     size.insert_element(kYCoord, 0);
00330     size.insert_element(kZCoord, 0);
00331 
00332     //if object is a box or a  marker, radius will equal to zero,
00333     //otherwise the radius will be set later.
00334     double radius = 0;
00335 
00336     //depending on type get either radius or width, height and depth
00337     if(type.compare("box") == 0) {
00338         //get last three values from line
00339         size = get_next_vector3d_in_line(line, line_number, true);
00340     } else if(type.compare("sphere") == 0) {
00341         //get only next value, which denotes the radius the sphere
00342         radius = get_next_double_value_in_line(line, line_number, false);
00343     }
00344 
00345     //if no exception is thrown up to this point, values read correctly
00346     //=> add values to global variables
00347     initiale_obstacle_types_.push_back(type);
00348     initiale_obstacle_positions_.push_back(position);
00349     initiale_obstacle_marker_information_.push_back(marker_info);
00350     initiale_obstacle_radius_.push_back(radius);
00351     initiale_obstacle_size_.push_back(size);
00352 }
00353 
00354 void Parser::load_robot_file() {
00355     load_robot_or_obstacle_file(true);
00356 }
00357 
00358 void Parser::load_obstacle_file() {
00359     load_robot_or_obstacle_file(false);
00360 }
00361 
00362 void Parser::load_robot_or_obstacle_file(bool load_robot_file) {
00363     string line;
00364     ifstream project_file;
00365     string filename = robot_filename_;
00366 
00367     //depending on which file to load, specify file extension
00368     if(load_robot_file)
00369         filename += ".robot";
00370     else
00371         filename += ".obstacle";
00372 
00373     int line_number = 0;
00374 
00375     project_file.open(filename.c_str());
00376     if(project_file.is_open()) {
00377 
00378         //read first line of file (only contains header not used here)
00379         if(!project_file.eof()) {
00380             getline(project_file, line);
00381             line_number++;
00382         }
00383 
00384         //read whole file line by line
00385         while(!project_file.eof()) {
00386             getline(project_file, line);
00387 
00388             //check if line is not empty
00389             if(!line.empty()) {
00390 
00391                 //check which type of file to load
00392                 if(load_robot_file) {
00393                     //initialize values of robot of this line
00394                     init_robot_values_for_line(line, ++line_number);
00395                 } else {
00396                     //initialize values of obstacle of this line
00397                     init_obstacle_values_for_line(line, ++line_number);
00398                 }
00399             }
00400         }
00401         project_file.close();
00402 
00403     } else {
00404         throw UnsupportedOperationException("Unable to open file "+filename+".");
00405     }
00406 }
00407 
00408 void Parser::load_projectfiles(const string& project_filename) {
00409     load_main_project_file(project_filename);
00410     load_robot_file();
00411     load_obstacle_file();
00412 }

00414 void Parser::save_main_project_file(const string& project_filename) {
00415 
00416     ofstream project_file;
00417     project_file.open(project_filename.c_str());
00418 
00419     if(project_file.is_open()) {
00420         //write variables
00421         project_file << "ASG=\"" << asg_ << "\"" << endl;
00422         project_file << "COMPASS_MODEL=\"" << compass_model_ << "\"" << endl;
00423         project_file << "EVENT_HANDLER=\"" << event_handler_ << "\"" << endl;
00424         project_file << "OBSTACLE_FILENAME=\"" << obstacle_filename_ << "\"" << endl;
00425         project_file << "PROJECT_NAME=\"" << project_name_ << "\"" << endl;
00426         project_file << "ROBOT_FILENAME=\"" << robot_filename_ << "\"" << endl;
00427         project_file << "STATISTICS_MODULE=\"" << statistics_module_ << "\"" << endl;
00428 
00429         project_file.close();
00430     } else {
00431         throw UnsupportedOperationException("Unable to open project file" +project_filename+"!");
00432     }
00433 }
00434 
00435 void Parser::save_robot_file() {
00436 
00437     ofstream robot_file;
00438     robot_file.open(robot_filename_.c_str());
00439 
00440     if(robot_file.is_open()) {
00441         //write robot header
00442         robot_file << "\"ID\",";
00443         robot_file << "\"x-position\",\"y-position\",\"z-position\",";
00444         robot_file << "\"type\",";
00445         robot_file << "\"x-velocity\",\"y-velocity\",\"z-velocity\",";
00446         robot_file << "\"x-acceleration\",\"y-acceleration\",\"z-acceleration\",";
00447         robot_file << "\"status\",";
00448         robot_file << "\"marker-info\",";
00449         robot_file << "\"algorithm\",";
00450         robot_file << "\"color\",";
00451         robot_file << "\"x-axis-1\",\"x-axis-2\",\"x-axis-3\",";
00452         robot_file << "\"y-axis-1\",\"y-axis-2\",\"y-axis-3\",";
00453         robot_file << "\"z-axis-1\",\"z-axis-2\",\"z-axis-3\"" << endl;
00454 
00455         //getting all RobotData from current world-information
00456         std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> > robots_data = sim_kernel_->history()->get_newest().robot_data();
00457 
00458         //iterate over all RobotData to parse them Robot by Robot
00459         for (vector<boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> >::iterator it = robots_data.begin();
00460                 it!=robots_data.end(); ++it) {
00461             robot_file << write_robot(*it);
00462         }
00463 
00464         robot_file.close();
00465     } else {
00466         throw UnsupportedOperationException("Unable to open robot file" +robot_filename_+"!");
00467     }
00468 }
00469 
00470 string Parser::write_robot(boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> robot_data) {
00471 
00472     stringstream output;
00473 
00474     output << robot_data->id()->id() << ",";
00475 
00476     output << robot_data->position()(kXCoord) << ",";
00477     output << robot_data->position()(kYCoord) << ",";
00478     output << robot_data->position()(kZCoord) << ",";
00479 
00480     output << robot_data->type() << ",";
00481 
00482     output << robot_data->velocity()(kXCoord) << ",";
00483     output << robot_data->velocity()(kYCoord) << ",";
00484     output << robot_data->velocity()(kZCoord) << ",";
00485 
00486     output << robot_data->acceleration()(kXCoord) << ",";
00487     output << robot_data->acceleration()(kYCoord) << ",";
00488     output << robot_data->acceleration()(kZCoord) << ",";
00489 
00490     output << robot_data->status() << ",";
00491 
00492     //TODO(mmarcus) include marker-information
00493     output << "0,";
00494     //TODO(mmarcus) include algorithm-information
00495     output << "\"FANCY_ALGO\",";
00496     //TODO(mmarcus) include color-information
00497     output << "0,";
00498 
00499     //x-axis
00500     output << (*(boost::get<0>(robot_data->coordinate_system_axis())))(kXCoord) << ",";
00501     output << (*(boost::get<0>(robot_data->coordinate_system_axis())))(kYCoord) << ",";
00502     output << (*(boost::get<0>(robot_data->coordinate_system_axis())))(kZCoord) << ",";
00503 
00504     //y-axis
00505     output << (*(boost::get<1>(robot_data->coordinate_system_axis())))(kXCoord) << ",";
00506     output << (*(boost::get<1>(robot_data->coordinate_system_axis())))(kYCoord) << ",";
00507     output << (*(boost::get<1>(robot_data->coordinate_system_axis())))(kZCoord) << ",";
00508 
00509     //z-axis
00510     output << (*(boost::get<2>(robot_data->coordinate_system_axis())))(kXCoord) << ",";
00511     output << (*(boost::get<2>(robot_data->coordinate_system_axis())))(kYCoord) << ",";
00512     output << (*(boost::get<2>(robot_data->coordinate_system_axis())))(kZCoord) << endl;
00513 
00514     return output.str();
00515 
00516     }
00517 
00518 void Parser::save_obstacle_file() {
00519 
00520     ofstream obstacle_file;
00521     obstacle_file.open(obstacle_filename_.c_str());
00522 
00523     if(obstacle_file.is_open()) {
00524         //write obstacle header
00525         obstacle_file << "\"type\",";
00526         obstacle_file << "\"x-position\",";
00527         obstacle_file << "\"y-position\",";
00528         obstacle_file << "\"z-position\",";
00529         obstacle_file << "\"marker-info\",";
00530         obstacle_file << "\"size-info\",";
00531         obstacle_file << "\"\",";
00532         obstacle_file << "\"\"" << endl;
00533 
00534         //fetching obstacles from the actual world-information through history-reference
00535         vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> > obstacles = sim_kernel_->history()->get_newest().obstacles();
00536 
00537         //iterate over all obstacles to parse them obstacle by obstacle
00538         for (vector<boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> >::iterator it = obstacles.begin(); it!=obstacles.end(); ++it) {
00539             obstacle_file << write_obstacle(*it);
00540         }
00541 
00542         //fetching marker-informations from actual world-information through history-reference
00543         vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> > markers = sim_kernel_->history()->get_newest().markers();
00544 
00545         //iterate over all markers
00546         for (vector<boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> >::iterator it = markers.begin(); it!=markers.end(); ++it) {
00547             obstacle_file << write_marker(*it);
00548         }
00549 
00550         obstacle_file.close();
00551     } else {
00552         throw UnsupportedOperationException("Unable to open obstacle file" +obstacle_filename_+"!");
00553     }
00554 }
00555 
00556 string Parser::write_obstacle(boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> current_obstacle) {
00557 
00558     stringstream output;
00559 
00560     //check by dynamic typecast if the obstacle is a sphere or a box.
00561     //See event_handler.cc for details to this technique
00562     if(boost::shared_ptr<Box> box_obstacle = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Box>(current_obstacle)) {
00563         output << "\"box\",";
00564 
00565         output << box_obstacle->position()(kXCoord) << ",";
00566         output << box_obstacle->position()(kYCoord) << ",";
00567         output << box_obstacle->position()(kZCoord) << ",";
00568 
00569         //TODO(mmarcus) include marker-information
00570         output << box_obstacle->width() << ",";
00571         output << box_obstacle->height() << ",";
00572         output << box_obstacle->depth() << endl;
00573     } else if(boost::shared_ptr<Sphere> sphere_obstacle = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Sphere>(current_obstacle)) {
00574         output << "\"sphere\",";
00575 
00576         output << sphere_obstacle->position()(kXCoord) << ",";
00577         output << sphere_obstacle->position()(kYCoord) << ",";
00578         output << sphere_obstacle->position()(kZCoord) << ",";
00579 
00580         //TODO(mmarcus) include marker-information
00581         output << sphere_obstacle->radius() << ",\"\",\"\"" << endl;
00582     } else {
00583         throw UnsupportedOperationException("Illegal type of obstacle found.");
00584     }
00585 
00586     return output.str();
00587 }
00588 
00589 string Parser::write_marker(boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> marker) {
00590 
00591     stringstream output;
00592 
00593     output << "\"marker\",";
00594 
00595     output << marker->position()(kXCoord) << ",";
00596     output << marker->position()(kYCoord) << ",";
00597     output << marker->position()(kZCoord) << ",";
00598     //TODO(mmarcus) include marker-information
00599     output << "\"\",\"\",\"\"" << endl;
00600 
00601     return output.str();
00602 }
00603 
00604 void Parser::save_projectfiles(const string& project_filename) {
00605     save_main_project_file(project_filename);
00606     save_robot_file();
00607     save_obstacle_file();
00608 }
